content: पिंजर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पिंज्-अरच्] Reddishyellow, tawny, gold-coloured; शिखा प्रदीपस्य सुवर्णपिंजरा <ls>Mk. 3. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 18. 40.</ls> --रः {@--1@} The reddish-yellow or tawny-brown colour. {@--2@} The yellow colour. --रं {@--1@} Gold. {@--2@} Yellow orpiment. {@--3@} A skeleton. {@--4@} A cage (for पंजर). {@--5@} The ribs or the cavity formed by them, the thorax.
